hero.title: We deliver perfect technology
hero.description: Solving customer challenges with innovative release agents.

footer.address: 14 Soi Krungthep Kreetha 31, Thap Chang, Saphan Sung, Bangkok 10250

section1.title: Suitability For An Item That Needs Secondary Processing
items: Pelicoat F (For film or thin-walling molding processing)
section1.features: This paintable release agent has vegetable oil as the main ingredient. It has superb release performance and is appropriate for secondary processing. Any residual agent on the product can be easily washed off with petroleum or alcohol-based general-purpose cleaners.

section2.title: Partly Suitable – Fluorine-based release agents
section2.features: This release agent contains a fluorine compound as the main ingredient. It forms a uniform film on the mold surface, provides superb release performance, and prevents the mold from becoming dirty. The agent can also be applied as a mold protecting agent. *(The agent can be used for secondary processing (painting) only after it is applied and heated (at least 150°C).)*

section3.title: Not Suitable – Silicone-based release agents
section3.features: This release agent contains silicone oil as the main ingredient. It provides high heat resistance and release performance. Depending on the molding conditions, high or low viscosity can be chosen.

section4.title: Special Purposes – Anti-memory & Less-sticky
section4.features: This anti-memory and less-sticky release agent contains fatty acid soap as the main ingredient. The agent is appropriate for thermoplastic resins in general as well as transparent resins.

section5.title: Special Purposes – Stress-crack Resistant
section5.features: This release agent that contains modified silicone oil as the main ingredient offers outstanding release performance and minimizes stress-cracks. This general-purpose agent is resistant to heat and static and is appropriate for transparent resins and engineering plastics.

section6.title: Automatic Release Agent Sprayer
section6.note: Mount this Pelicoat cans onto the Autoben. The system makes it easier to spray and set the spraying time and quantity. The device applies the agent appropriately and equally according to the number of shots specified.

recommendations.Vegetable Oil-Based: Perfect for secondary processing like painting — easy to clean!
recommendations.Fluorine-Based: Partially suitable — requires heating (≥150°C) before painting
recommendations.Silicone-Based: Not suitable for painting — silicone adheres too strongly
recommendations.Fatty Acid Soap: Reduces memory marks & stickiness — great for clear resins!
recommendations.Modified Silicone: Prevents stress cracks — ideal for engineering plastics
recommendations.Autoben AS983: Automated spraying with precise control — saves time & waste!

recommendations.Volatile: Double protection with vapor layer — no oil, no stains!
recommendations.Sabicro: Semi-rigid wax coating — easy to remove, great for short-term
recommendations.Rakutoreru: Ultra-thin & quick-drying — minimal prep shots needed
recommendations.Hi-Guard DK-5: 6+ months outdoor rust protection — ideal for export

volatile.title: Antirust Agents for Molds (Volatile)
volatile.subtitle: Vegetable oil-based release agents
volatile.features: The agent forms a tight, solid covering over the mold and a layer of vaporized agent over the covering for double protection. Because the agent contains no oil, it leaves almost no stains on molded articles. The agent can be removed by applying several preliminary shots
volatile.application: The agent prevents rust on the molds when oil should be avoided or as a substitute for grease or antirust oil that is difficult to remove. Close the molds and then pack and seal them in a plastic bag so that the vaporized agent does not diffuse into the air but remains around the molds for the desired effect.

sabicro.title: Antirust Agents for Molds (Oil-based)
sabicro.name: Sabicro
sabicro.features: The antirust agent for plastic molds forms a tight, semi-rigid covering over the target. This wax-type agent is less permeable so that no oil oozes in the molding process. Removing the coating is comparatively easy.
sabicro.application: Antirust for plastic and precision molds (shorter period of time)

rakutoreru.title: Antirust Agents for Molds (Oil-based)
rakutoreru.name: Rakutoreru
rakutoreru.features: This antirust agent for plastic and precision molds forms an ultra-thin, quick-drying coating. The agent is less sticky and has less oil oozing so that the coating is easy to remove in the molding process, which reduces the number of preliminary shots.
rakutoreru.application: Antirust for plastic and precision molds (shorter period of time)

hiGuard.title: Antirust agent for equipment (Powerful wax type)
hiGuard.name: Hi-Guard DK-5
hiGuard.features: The agent is tack-free two to three hours after application and forms a dried coat after about one day. After coat formation, no stickiness or oil seepage will be observed and the antirust function will continue for more than six months outdoors. The agent is also appropriate for application on equipment with a complex structure because it penetrates into the minute concaves while the coat is formed.
hiGuard.application: The agent achieves the antirust effect even under the harsh conditions of high humidity indoors or outdoors for a long period of time and is appropriate for export.

pelicoat12.title: Multipurpose antirust and lubricating agent
pelicoat12.name: Pelicoat 12
pelicoat12.features: This multipurpose agent features antirust, lubricating, cleaning, and penetration functions. The agent has outstanding water displacement capabilities and antirust effects on all metals. With its low surface tension and high permeating capacity, the agent serves as a lubricant for machines, equipment, and automobile components. It also prevents fingerprints and sweat from corroding the surface.
pelicoat12.application: Antirust and lubrication of metal products and loosening tightly fastened bolts and nuts

legato.title: Multipurpose antirust and lubricating agent
legato.name: Legato
legato.features: This agent is an outstanding lubricant due to the special oil-based additive. The coating offers excellent extreme-pressure performance and abrasion resistance so that the effect lasts for a long time. With its high permeating capacity, the agent penetrates rust and dirt to easily loosen rusted bolts and nuts. A thin coat with less stickiness covers the metal surface to produce an outstanding antirust effect. The agent also displaces water and demonstrates excellent antirust performance against salt water.
legato.application: Maintenance of machine tools and machines for specific purposes, servicing tools, lubricating small precision equipment, loosening bolts, nuts; screws; antirust; lubrication of metal products

notes.1: Antirust effects varies depending on conditions of use.
notes.2: Values when the molds are semi-sealed.
notes.3: Excellent = Very Easy (No preliminary shots needed), Good = Easy (Few preliminary shots needed)

recommendations.GP Cleaner: Fast-drying, low odor — perfect for daily mold cleaning!
recommendations.Ace Cleaner C3: Powerful degreasing — removes release agents & grease fast
recommendations.Mold Cleaner: Dissolves plastic residue — ideal for stubborn mold stains
recommendations.Depo Cleaner: Gas burn & deposit remover — works best at 40-80°C
recommendations.Brake & Parts Cleaner C5: High-pressure spray — great for brakes & metal parts
recommendations.Brake & Parts Cleaner Jumbo A: Same power, bigger can — for heavy-duty jobs

gp.title: GP Cleaner Series
items: GP Cleaner – Standard Type (*An undiluted solution is also available.)
GP Cleaner C-Y – Chemical Attack-Resistant Type (*An undiluted solution is also available.)
GP Cleaner C-Y2 – Good Release Performance, Chemical Attack-Resistant Type (*An undiluted solution is also available.)
gp.features: Multipurpose cleaning agents remove grease, oil and dirt on molds for plastics or molded articles. The agents have almost no influence on molded articles and dry quickly.

ace.title: Ace Cleaner C3
ace.features: A cleaning agent suitable for the removal of antirust agents, grease, oil and release agents on molds for plastics. This is also for cleaning machines and is an outstanding degreasing agent.

mold.title: Mold Cleaner
mold.features: This cleaning agent will dissolve and remove resin from molds for plastics. Spray the agent thoroughly on the contaminated surface, leave for a while until it penetrates enough and then wipe off with a cloth or remove with a tool. Using the GP Cleaner is also effective.

depo.title: Depo Cleaner
depo.features: Spray the agent thoroughly onto the contaminated part of a mold surface and wait three to five minutes until the agent penetrates. While the surface is still wet, give preliminary shots. The agent may remain on the surface after use, so wash it off with a solvent like the GP Cleaner. The ideal temperature of the mold is between 40 and 80°C.
depo.application: For gas burns on molds for plastics and removal of deposits

brakeC5.title: Brake & Parts Cleaner C5
brakeC5.features: These are designed to cleanse resin or metal powder from a brake drum and lining instead of blowing the powder or resin off. The cleaner offers high spray pressure and excellent degreasing effects as an outstanding oil and grease remover.
brakeC5.application: Degreasing and cleansing of general machine parts as well as brake drums, lining and disk pads

brakeJumbo.title: Brake & Parts Cleaner Jumbo A
brakeJumbo.features: Same high-performance formula as C5, but in a larger can for heavy-duty and frequent use.
brakeJumbo.application: Degreasing and cleansing of general machine parts as well as brake drums, lining and disk pads

partsC7.title: Parts Cleaner C7
partsC7.features: With the strong dissolving power, high spray pressure and degreasing effect, this can clean tough dirt that has accumulated for a long period of time.
partsC7.application: Cleansing parts when an engine is dismantled or machine parts with tough dirt

table.note: *1. Relative comparison with our products on a scale of one (weakest) to ten (strongest)

products.name: Ace Cleaner C3
products.app: Degreasing and cleansing molds and other general parts

products.name: Depo Cleaner
products.app: Cleansing mold deposit and plastic dirt

products.name: Brake & Parts Cleaner C5
products.app: For brake and other general parts

products.name: Brake & Parts Cleaner Jumbo A
products.app: For brake and other general parts

lubricant.title: Lubricant and Others
lubricant.slidingSection: Lubricant for sliding surfaces and bearings
lubricant.highPerfDesc: This spray grease contains extreme-pressure additives and lasts for a long period of time, demonstrating outstanding abrasion, heat and pressure resistance. The grease has a wide service temperature range and produces a long-term effect as lubricant, antirust and moisture barrier on rotating and sliding metal parts.

recommendations.Metal Protect Dry: Ideal for mold nozzles, reduces dust adhesion, perfect for high-cleanliness environments!
recommendations.Lubriflow: Excellent for frequently sliding parts, reduces wear, provides rust protection!
recommendations.Bearlex FX-C: Works on all surfaces, leaves no residue, ideal for delicate and transparent work!
recommendations.Grease Keeper White: Withstands high temperatures up to 220°C, suitable for guide pins and sliding parts!
recommendations.MO Super Grease: Heavy-duty spray grease, resists high pressure and heat!
recommendations.MO Super Paste: Dense texture, long-lasting adhesion, perfect for load-bearing points!
recommendations.SuperGreaseSprayNo1: Easy to spray, protects against rust, versatile for general use!
recommendations.Antistatic agent * Inaguard: Prevents static electricity in plastics, films, and electronics!
recommendations.Surface treatment agent * Restore: Repairs weld lines, restores surface to a beautiful finish!
recommendations.BN Spray: Withstands temperatures up to 900°C, ideal for aluminum casting and extrusion!

metalProtect.title: Metal Protect Dry
metalProtect.features: This thin-coating, dry-type lubricant forms a special lubricating PTFE coating over a metal surface. With the excellent heat resistance, adhesiveness and thinness, the lubricant is appropriate for use where dirt should be avoided.
metalProtect.application: Maintenance of the mold ejector pins and sliding parts of a molding machine, the rotating and sliding parts of precision machines and equipment.

lubriflow.title: Lubriflow
lubriflow.features: Ultra-fine PTFE particles form a smooth covering over a metal surface for outstanding lubricity and abrasive resistance. The lubricant also offers high permeating capacity and detergency and removes water from the surface with its excellent water displacement capability, which results in an antirust effect.
lubriflow.application: Maintenance of the mold ejector pins and sliding parts of a molding machine, the rotating and sliding parts of precision machines and equipment.

bearlex.title: Bearlex FX-C
bearlex.features: This fluorine lubricant is designed to minimize the influence on molded articles. The special lubricating coating has a wide service temperature range and allows application on a variety of surfaces. The thin coating is appropriate for use where dirt should be avoided and has a wide variety of uses as lubricant.
bearlex.application: The mold ejector pins and sliding parts of a molding machine and the rotating and sliding parts of precision machines

greaseKeeper.title: Grease Keeper White
greaseKeeper.features: This special urea grease contains carefully selected thickeners and extreme-pressure additives to achieve high-level heat resistance and lubricity. The grease has a wide service temperature range, allows application on a variety of surfaces and reduces the frequency of greasing when servicing molds.
greaseKeeper.application: Mold guide pins, sliding parts of a molding machine and parts where load bearing capacity and the prevention of seizure and adhesion and long product life are required.

inaguard.title: Antistatic agent * Inaguard
inaguard.features: This spray prevents static electricity on plastic molded articles, electronic parts, films and automobile parts. Simply with a light spray, it prevents accidents, declines in production efficiency and dirt caused by static electricity.
inaguard.application: Plastics in general, electronic parts, film and automobile parts

restore.title: Surface treatment agent * Restore and Restore PP (Black)
restore.features: This surface treatment agent is designed to diluter or improve the appearance of molded articles. A light application hides welds lines on a pear-skin finished and grained surface or diluters the surface.
restore.application: Restore and Restore PP (Black) for PP and PE

bnSpray.title: BN Spray
bnSpray.features: The agent contains boron nitride (BN) for excellent lubricity and release performance. With outstanding spreading capability and adhesiveness over a sliding surface and base material, the agent offers excellent lubricity in an environment of high loads.
bnSpray.application: Can be used as a release agent for molding diamond tools, and lubricant and release agent for aluminum window frame molding, aluminum extruding machines and other conditions under high temperature.

law.title: Regulations & Safety
law.heroDesc: We strictly comply with global safety and environmental regulations to ensure product safety and sustainability.

prtr.title: PRTR
prtr.desc: Pollutant Release and Transfer Registers (PRTR) are systems to collect and disseminate data on how many toxic chemicals from which source are released into the environment or disposed of as waste. The system calculates the type and volume of chemical substances released into the environment.

organicSolvent.title: Ordinance on Prevention of Organic Solvent Poisoning
organicSolvent.desc: Organic solvents are volatile and can be taken into the human body by inhalation. The solvents are also absorbed through the skin. If large volumes of such solvents are absorbed, they can cause acute poisoning. To prevent accidental poisoning, the Ordinance on Prevention of Organic Solvent Poisoning was established under the Industrial Safety and Health Act. Substances that need special attention out of all organic solvents are listed and classified into classes 1 to 3.

rohs.title: RoHS
rohs.desc: Restriction of Hazardous Substances is a directive restricting the use of specific hazardous materials in the production of electric and electronic equipment. The directive applies to all components used in the law governing electric and electronic equipment and mandates that companies must not use any harmful substances in every stage from production to disposal. The directive restricts the use of the following 6 substances used in every operation: hexavalent chromium, polybrominated biphenyls (PBB), and polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDE). No RoHS-restricted substance is used in our products.

pfos.title: PFOS and PFOA
pfos.desc: Around 1990, perfluorochemicals (PFC), which were thought to be safe, were found to contaminate human and animal blood. Based on this discovery, the US Environmental Protection Agency prohibited the use of perfluorooctane sulfonates (PFOS) out of all PFCs in 2000, which has been used in stain and waterproof coatings. It also prohibited the use of perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) for the same reason. No PFOS and PFOA are used in our products intentionally.

ghs.title: GHS
ghs.desc: The United Nations recommended is to use the Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals (GHS). The objective is to provide data of the kind and degree of hazard and toxicity for the chemical substance in the form of a label that helps understanding of a safety data sheet according to a globally unified rule.

law.aerosolInstructions: Instructions for the Use of Aerosol Cans
instructions: Mistake may cause poisoning, fire, and explosion of cans. Read carefully and understand the cautions and MSDS before use.
It is harmful to the human body if you inhale the spray. Use in a well-ventilated place.
If you inhaled large volumes of the agent or if you feel sick, move to fresh air. If you do not recover, consult a physician.
Do not spray toward eyes, nose, mouth, or skin. If the agent gets into the eyes, wash thoroughly with water.
Do not use near fire, heat, or sparks. The agent is combustible.
Do not store in places with a temperature above 40°C. Do not expose to direct sunlight because doing so may cause an explosion or leak.

After use, dispose of the can by piercing the spray button outward, away from open flames until the spray sound ceases. Discarded the disposal of the emptied can to specialist waste treatment service approved by the prefectural governor.
